Union_City.Holy Sepulchre Cemetery (Hayward, Califo: Holy Sepulchre Cemetery is a cemetery in Hayward, California. It is a Catholic cemetery run by the Roman Catholic Diocese of Oakland, which also operates the Holy Angels Funeral and Cremation Center at the same location.. It was the first Catholic Church-owned cemetery in the U.S. Vineyards planted in 2006 provide grapes for sacramental wine used by the Oakland Diocese.
